# Dashboard Compiler

> Convert human-friendly YAML dashboard definitions into Kibana NDJSON format. Python compiler
> and TypeScript VS Code extension for creating and managing Kibana dashboards.

## Getting Started

- [Installation and Quick Start](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/): Get up and running with your first dashboard
- [CLI Reference](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/CLI/): Complete command-line documentation
- [VS Code Extension](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/vscode-extension/): Live preview and visual editing

## User Guide

- [Dashboard Configuration](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/dashboard/dashboard/): Dashboard-level settings and options
- [Panel Types Overview](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/panels/base/): Common configuration for all panel types
- [Lens Panels](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/panels/lens/): Chart panels (metric, pie, XY, gauge, datatable, etc.)
- [Dashboard Controls](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/controls/config/): Interactive filtering controls
- [Filters and Queries](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/filters/config/): Data filtering and query configuration
- [Complete Examples](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/examples/): Real-world YAML dashboard examples

## LLM-Driven Workflows

- [LLM Workflows Overview](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/llm-workflows/): Complete guide for using LLMs with kb-yaml-to-lens
- [Dashboard Decompiling Guide](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/dashboard-decompiling-guide/): Convert Kibana JSON to YAML
- [Dashboard Style Guide](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/dashboard-style-guide/): Best practices for dashboard design
- [llms-full.txt](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/llms-full.txt): Complete documentation for LLM context

## Developer Guide

- [Programmatic Usage](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/programmatic-usage/): Python API for dynamic dashboard generation
- [Architecture Overview](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/architecture/): Technical design and data flow
- [API Reference](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/api/): Auto-generated Python API documentation

## Optional

- [Kibana Architecture Reference](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/kibana-architecture/): Understanding Kibana's internal structure
- [PyPI Publishing](https://strawgate.github.io/kb-yaml-to-lens/pypi-publishing/): Package release process
